sn44.7:3.1: 7. Moggallānasutta
sn44.7:4.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.7:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.7:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.7:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho moggallāna, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.7:5.7: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho moggallāna, antavā loko”ti?
sn44.7:5.13: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho moggallāna, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran”ti?
sn44.7:5.16: “Kiṃ pana, bho moggallāna, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran”ti?
sn44.7:5.19: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho moggallāna, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.7:5.22: “Kiṃ pana, bho moggallāna, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.7:5.25: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho moggallāna, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.7:5.27: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.7:5.28: “Kiṃ pana, bho moggallāna, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.7:5.30: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.7:6.1: “Ko nu kho, bho moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo, yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti—
sn44.7:6.2: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā?
sn44.7:6.3: Ko pana, bho moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo, yena samaṇassa gotamassa evaṃ puṭṭhassa na evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti—
sn44.7:6.4: sassato lokotipi, asassato lokotipi, antavā lokotipi, anantavā lokotipi, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīrantipi, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīrantipi, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātipi, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātipi, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātipi, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātipī”ti?
sn44.7:7.1: “Aññatitthiyā kho, vaccha, paribbājakā cakkhuṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti … pe …
sn44.7:7.2: jivhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti … pe …
sn44.7:7.3: manaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti.
sn44.7:7.4: Tasmā aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti—
sn44.7:7.6: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā.
sn44.7:7.7: Tathāgato ca kho, vaccha, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho cakkhuṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati … pe …
sn44.7:7.8: jivhaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati … pe …
sn44.7:7.9: manaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn44.7:7.10: Tasmā tathāgatassa evaṃ puṭṭhassa na evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti—
sn44.7:7.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātipī”ti.
sn44.7:8.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.7:8.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.7:8.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.7:8.5: “kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.7:8.8: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.7:8.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.7:9.1: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti:
sn44.7:9.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā?
sn44.7:9.4: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena bhoto gotamassa evaṃ puṭṭhassa na evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti:
sn44.7:9.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipī”ti?
sn44.7:10.1: “Aññatitthiyā kho, vaccha, paribbājakā cakkhuṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti … pe …
sn44.7:10.2: jivhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti … pe …
sn44.7:10.3: manaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassanti.
sn44.7:10.4: Tasmā aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti:
sn44.7:10.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā.
sn44.7:10.7: Tathāgato ca kho, vaccha, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho cakkhuṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati … pe …
sn44.7:10.8: jivhaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati … pe …
sn44.7:10.9: manaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn44.7:10.10: Tasmā tathāgatassa evaṃ puṭṭhassa na evaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti:
sn44.7:10.11: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antavā loko’tipi, ‘anantavā loko’tipi, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipī”ti.
sn44.7:11.2: Yatra hi nāma satthu ca sāvakassa ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidaṃ aggapadasmiṃ.
sn44.7:11.3: Idānāhaṃ, bho gotama, samaṇaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ apucchiṃ.
sn44.7:11.4: Samaṇopi me moggallāno etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi tamatthaṃ byākāsi, seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo.
sn44.7:11.5: Acchariyaṃ, bho gotama, abbhutaṃ, bho gotama.
sn44.7:11.6: Yatra hi nāma satthu ca sāvakassa ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidaṃ aggapadasmin”ti.
